alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:28PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Polk, Madison, southeastern Cass, southeastern Guthrie, Dallas, Adair and western Warren Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogden to 7 miles northeast of Panora to 7 miles northeast of Lake Icaria. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Perry around 1040 PM CDT. Dallas Center around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Woodward, Granger, Grimes, Saylorville Lake, Big Creek Lake, Polk City, Saylorville and Avenue Of The Saints Event Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 43 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 101. Interstate 80 between mile markers 80 and 142. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central, south central, southwestern and west central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Polk; Warren
